Text:
Thank you, kind sir.

The man is a genius, but we all already knew that.
Will be buying the dvd when it comes out.

From one "Hevy Devy" fan to the next, let me say "Thank You" for sharimg this file with the masses. Of course this show happened to fall on a week where I could not get away from work and the states to be there. Though thanks to you I can see it a little sooner from when the DVD comes out. So thank you again.
